short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Downloads Profile Picture from Twitter™ For You

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HOW TO USE: To download a profile picture from Twitter™ for free, click on the extension icon, then click the Download button, and it should download a photo for you, for free.

How to use this as a "Profile Picture Viewer for Twitter™": once you download the photo, just open it up full size on your desktop.

This extension supports downloading profile pictures from a Twitter™ account. You could say this is also a Account Profile Picture Downloader for Twitter™.

Profile pictures on Twitter™ are also known as "display pictures" or (dp). You can use this extension to download Account dp (display pictures) from Twitter™.

A common shortname for profile pictures are "pfp". You can use this to download a Account Pfp (Profile Picture) for Twitter™.
